biography.bio: Born in Odense, Denmark on December 9th, 1934, Morten Grunwald is "World famous in Denmark" for several popular film roles. Most famous, however, will always be his Benny in all of the "Olsen Banden" films, where he starred alongside Ove Sprogøe and Poul Bundgaard. He attended Odense Theatrical School in 1958 and graduated from The Royal Theater of Denmark's Theatrical School in 1962. Since 1971, he has been the director of several theatres in Copenhagen: Bristol Teatret (1971-1980), Betty Nansen Teatret (1980-1992), Østre Gasværk (1992-1998).
biography.name: Morten Grunwald

biography.bio: Judy Gringer was born on January 23, 1941 in Denmark. She is an actress, known for The Factory Outing (1978), Majorens oppasser (1964) and In the Middle of the Night (1984).
biography.name: Judy Gringer

biography.bio: Emil Hass Christensen was born on January 23, 1903 in Frederiksberg, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Englen i sort (1957), Fem mand og Rosa (1964) and Drømmen om det hvide slot (1962). He was married to Hjørdis Gunnlögsson. He died on January 12, 1982 in Denmark.
biography.name: Emil Hass Christensen

biography.bio: Poul Bundgaard was born on October 27, 1922 in Hellerup, Denmark as Poul Arne Bundgaard. He was an actor, known for The Last Exploits of the Olsen Gang (1974), The Olsen Gang in a Fix (1969) and The Olsen Gang Sees Red (1976). He was married to Kirsten Pedersen and Kjær, Bente Elisabeth. He died on June 3, 1998 in Gentofte, Denmark.
biography.name: Poul Bundgaard

biography.bio: Carl Ottosen was born on July 18, 1918 in Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for Soldaterkammerater på sjov (1962), Journey to the Seventh Planet (1962) and Hunger (1966). He died on January 8, 1972 in Denmark.
biography.name: Carl Ottosen

biography.bio: Gunnar Lemvigh was born on March 28, 1909 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Axel og Valborg (1961), Næste gang er det dig (1948) and Pretty Boy and Rosa (1967). He died on November 16, 1979 in Denmark.
biography.name: Gunnar Lemvigh

biography.bio: Arthur Jensen was born on November 9, 1897 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Olsen Gang's Big Score (1972) and The Torndal Cousins (1973). He died on November 28, 1981 in Gentofte, Denmark.
biography.name: Arthur Jensen

biography.bio: Bendt Rothe was born on May 9, 1921 in Copenhagen, Denmark as Bendt Vincentz Christian Rothe. He was an actor, known for Gertrud (1964), Babette's Feast (1987) and Fem mand og Rosa (1964). He was married to Birte Merete Gad, Vigga Bro, Helle Høeg Houmøller and Asta Riis Poulsen. He died on December 31, 1989 in Denmark.
biography.name: Bendt Rothe

biography.bio: Pouel Kern was born on June 9, 1908 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Babette's Feast (1987), Den skaldede sangerinde (1966) and The Story of a Mother (1949). He was married to Blanche Funch. He died on February 17, 1993 in Denmark.
biography.name: Pouel Kern

biography.bio: Willy Rathnov was born on May 13, 1937 in Roskilde, Denmark as Kaj Willy Rasmussen. He was an actor, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Olsen Gang in Jutland (1971) and Along Came a Soldier (1969). He died on August 29, 1999 in Denmark.
biography.name: Willy Rathnov

biography.bio: Jørgen Kiil was born on February 13, 1931 in Århus, Denmark as Jørgen Peter Christiansen Kiil. He was an actor, known for Minor Mishaps (2002), Webmaster (1998) and The Parallel Corpse (1982). He died on June 1, 2003 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
biography.name: Jørgen Kiil

biography.bio: Eik Koch was born on June 7, 1914 in Viby Sjælland, Denmark as Eik Koch Sönchen. He was an actor, known for The Son from Vingaarden (1975), Kun sandheden (1975) and Pelsen (1971). He died on October 28, 1982 in Denmark.
biography.name: Eik Koch

biography.bio: Hans-Henrik Krause was born on March 13, 1918 in Hellerup, Denmark. He was an actor and director, known for Ugeavisen (1990), Den forsvundne fuldmægtig (1971) and Lady with the Light Gloves (1942). He was married to Inge Hvid-Møller. He died on April 15, 2002.
biography.name: Hans-Henrik Krause

biography.bio: Bjørn Puggaard-Müller was born on March 13, 1922 in Gentofte, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Alt for kvinden (1964), Vi er allesammen tossede (1959) and Relations (1969). He was married to Bente Falbøl. He died on May 13, 1989 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
biography.name: Bjørn Puggaard-Müller

biography.bio: Else-Marie was born on October 19, 1904 in Copenhagen, Denmark as Else-Marie Hansen. She was an actress, known for Hvor går Karl hen? (1957), Ve' den, der lyver (1929) and Eventyrrejsen (1960). She was married to Holger Juul Hansen. She died on August 11, 2003 in Charlottenlund, Denmark.
biography.name: Else-Marie
